text: The Lovelorn is a 1927 American silent drama film directed by John P. McCarthy and written by Frederic Hatton and Bradley King. The film stars Sally O'Neil, Molly O'Day, Larry Kent, James Murray, and Charles Delaney. The film was released on December 17, 1927, by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Cast == *Sally O'Neil as Georgie Hastings *Molly O'Day as Ann Hastings *Larry Kent as Bill Warren *James Murray as Charlie *Charles Delaney as Jimmy *George Cooper as Joe Sprotte *Allan Forrest as Ernest Brooks *Dorothy Cumming as Beatrice Fairfax *Isabelle Noonan as Young girl (uncredited) ==References== ==External links== * * *Stills at silenthollywood.com Category:1927 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American drama films Category:1927 drama films Category:Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American silent feature films
title: The Lovelorn
